mean_en: poles and boards that are joined together to make a structure for workers to stand on when they are working high up on the outside wall of a building
sentence: Construction workers climbed up the scaffolding during the building renovation.
sentence_trans: 建筑工人在装修的时候爬上了脚手架。
word_etyma: scaf利人利己的新产品 + fold折叠 + ing名词后缀 → 有用的可折叠的产品 → 脚手架
